ourservices.title: Our Services
ourservices.slogan1: We provide you with a recycling bin
ourservices.slogan3: We send them to recyclers, not the landfill
ourservices.notice1: To ensure we can provide our service to your address,please whatsapp me on
ourservices.notice2: to check before you subscribe to our service
ourservices.deposite: A $200 refundable deposit will be charged for the recycling bin

donation.title: Donation
donation.info: Your donation will help us make recycling in Hong Kong more available, affordable and sustainable. If you share our vision and belief,we welcome your donations.

terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.t1: There is no contract for this service, you may cancel anytime but there will be no part refund.
terms.t2: Your $200 deposit for the bin will be returned upon the cancellation of our service and the returned of our recycling bin.
terms.t3: Your $200 deposit will be forfeited if your recycling bin is lost or damaged beyond repair.
terms.t4: Please leave your recycling bin where we can reach it preferably by your gate,if we cannot find your bin we cannot collect. You may have to wait until the next collection, there will be no refund for this.
terms.t5: Under severe weather warnings such asTyphoon warning 8 or above, Red or Black rain warning, we may defer or cancel your collection.

contactus.title: Contact Us
contactus.address1: BO9 2/F Kin Tak Fung Industrial Building
